p: Epimedium pudingense is a rare species only distributed in the Puding County of Guizhou Province in China, and it is used as herba epimedii by local people. Furthermore, E. pudingense is a medicinal Epimedium germplasm resource peculiar to the Guizhou Province in China (He etÂ al. 2011). In this study, we present the first complete chloroplast genome of E. pudingense. The results will provide more useful information for phylogenetic and evolutionary research of the genus Epimedium.
